sentences.sContent: You can go to bed with one view and wake up with another.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can go to bed with one view and wake up with another.
sentences.sCn: 你可以在一种景色相伴下入眠，而醒来看到的是另一种景色。

sentences.sContent: Maybe you’re dreaming me; maybe we only exist in each other’s dreams and every morning when we wake up we forget all about each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Maybe you’re dreaming me; maybe we only exist in each other’s dreams and every morning when we wake up we forget all about each other.
sentences.sCn: 也许是你梦到了我；也许我们只存在于对方的梦里，每天早晨当我们醒来时我们就忘了和对方有关的一切。

synos.tran: 醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相
